00033         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER GLM_CONSTEXPR length_t tmat2x2<T, P>::length() const
00034         {

00066         template <typename T, precision P>
00067         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x2<T, P>::tmat2x2()
00068         {
00069                 this->value[0] = col_type(1, 0);
00070                 this->value[1] = col_type(0, 1);
00071         }

00099         template <typename T, precision P>
00100         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x2<T, P>::tmat2x2
00101         (
00102                 T const & s
00103         )
00104         {
00105                 value_type const Zero(0);
00106                 this->value[0] = col_type(s, Zero);
00107                 this->value[1] = col_type(Zero, s);
00108         }

00110         template <typename T, precision P>
00111         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x2<T, P>::tmat2x2
00112         (
00113                 T const & x0, T const & y0,
00114                 T const & x1, T const & y1
00115         )
00116         {
00117                 this->value[0] = col_type(x0, y0);
00118                 this->value[1] = col_type(x1, y1);
00119         }

00133         // Conversion constructors
00134         template <typename T, precision P>
00135         template <typename X1, typename Y1, typename X2, typename Y2>
00136         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x2<T, P>::tmat2x2
00137         (
00138                 X1 const & x1, Y1 const & y1,
00139                 X2 const & x2, Y2 const & y2
00140         )
00141         {
00142                 this->value[0] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x1), value_type(y1));
00143                 this->value[1] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x2), value_type(y2));
00144         }

00147         template <typename V1, typename V2>
00148         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x2<T, P>::tmat2x2
00149         (
00150                 tvec2<V1, P> const & v1,
00151                 tvec2<V2, P> const & v2
00152         )
00153         {
00154                 this->value[0] = col_type(v1);
00155                 this->value[1] = col_type(v2);
00156         }

00372 
00373         template <typename T, precision P>
00374         struct compute_inverse<detail::tmat2x2, T, P>
00375         {
00376                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static detail::tmat2x2<T, P> call(detail::tmat2x2<T, P> const & m)
00377                 {
00378                         T OneOverDeterminant = static_cast<T>(1) / (
00379                                 + m[0][0] * m[1][1]
00380                                 - m[1][0] * m[0][1]);
00381 
00382                         detail::tmat2x2<T, P> Inverse(
00383                                 + m[1][1] * OneOverDeterminant,
00384                                 - m[0][1] * OneOverDeterminant,
00385                                 - m[1][0] * OneOverDeterminant,
00386                                 + m[0][0] * OneOverDeterminant);
00387 
00388                         return Inverse;
00389                 }
00390         };

00396         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x2<T, P> operator+
00397         (
00398                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m,
00399                 T const & s
00400         )
00401         {
00402                 return tmat2x2<T, P>(
00403                         m[0] + s,
00404                         m[1] + s);
00405         }

00490 
00491         template <typename T, precision P>
00492         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat2x2<T, P>::col_type operator*
00493         (
00494                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m,
00495                 typename tmat2x2<T, P>::row_type const & v
00496         )
00497         {
00498                 return detail::tvec2<T, P>(
00499                         m[0][0] * v.x + m[1][0] * v.y,
00500                         m[0][1] * v.x + m[1][1] * v.y);
00501         }
00502 
00503         template <typename T, precision P>
00504         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat2x2<T, P>::row_type operator*
00505         (
00506                 typename tmat2x2<T, P>::col_type const & v,
00507                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m
00508         )
00509         {
00510                 return detail::tvec2<T, P>(
00511                         v.x * m[0][0] + v.y * m[0][1],
00512                         v.x * m[1][0] + v.y * m[1][1]);
00513         }
00514 
00515         template <typename T, precision P>
00516         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x2<T, P> operator*
00517         (
00518                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m1,
00519                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m2
00520         )
00521         {
00522                 return tmat2x2<T, P>(
00523                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1],
00524                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1],
00525                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1],
00526                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1]);
00527         }
00528 
00529         template <typename T, precision P>
00530         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x2<T, P> operator*
00531         (
00532                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m1,
00533                 tmat3x2<T, P> const & m2
00534         )
00535         {
00536                 return tmat3x2<T, P>(
00537                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1],
00538                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1],
00539                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1],
00540                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1],
00541                         m1[0][0] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[2][1],
00542                         m1[0][1] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[2][1]);
00543         }
00544 
00545         template <typename T, precision P>
00546         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x2<T, P> operator*
00547         (
00548                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m1,
00549                 tmat4x2<T, P> const & m2
00550         )
00551         {
00552                 return tmat4x2<T, P>(
00553                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1],
00554                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1],
00555                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1],
00556                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1],
00557                         m1[0][0] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[2][1],
00558                         m1[0][1] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[2][1],
00559                         m1[0][0] * m2[3][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[3][1],
00560                         m1[0][1] * m2[3][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[3][1]);
00561         }

00587         template <typename T, precision P>
00588         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat2x2<T, P>::col_type operator/
00589         (
00590                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m, 
00591                 typename tmat2x2<T, P>::row_type & v
00592         )
00593         {
00594                 return detail::compute_inverse<detail::tmat2x2, T, P>::call(m) * v;
00595         }
00596 
00597         template <typename T, precision P>
00598         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat2x2<T, P>::row_type operator/ 
00599         (
00600                 typename tmat2x2<T, P>::col_type const & v,
00601                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m
00602         )
00603         {
00604                 return v * detail::compute_inverse<detail::tmat2x2, T, P>::call(m);
00605         }
00606 
00607         template <typename T, precision P>
00608         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x2<T, P> operator/
00609         (
00610                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m1,
00611                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m2
00612         )
00613         {       
00614                 tmat2x2<T, P> m1_copy(m1);
00615                 return m1_copy /= m2;
00616         }

00619         template <typename T, precision P>
00620         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x2<T, P> const operator-
00621         (
00622                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m
00623         )
00624         {

00626                         -m[0],

00631         // Boolean operators
00632 
00633         template <typename T, precision P>
00634         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator==
00635         (
00636                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m1,
00637                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m2
00638         )
00639         {
00640                 return (m1[0] == m2[0]) && (m1[1] == m2[1]);
00641         }
00642 
00643         template <typename T, precision P>
00644         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator!=
00645         (
00646                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m1,
00647                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m2
00648         )
00649         {
00650                 return (m1[0] != m2[0]) || (m1[1] != m2[1]);
00651         }
00652 
00653 } //namespace detail
00654 } //namespace glm
